Plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the principal thinks of that.
Title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
Actors: Matthew Broderick, Alan Ruck, Mia Sara, Jeffrey Jones
tomatoConsensus: Matthew Broderick charms in Ferris Bueller's Day Off, a light and irrepressibly fun movie about being young and having fun.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win.
